text: Costică Dafinoiu (6 February 1954 – 8 June 2022) was a Romanian light- heavyweight boxer. His career began in 1969. He won a bronze medal at the 1976 Summer Olympics. He retired in 1981. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Romania Category:Boxers
title: Costică Dafinoiu
